21 #include "media_support_info.h"
22 #include "package.h"

25 EPUB3_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
26 
27 MediaSupportInfo::MediaSupportInfo(shared_ptr<Package> owner) : OwnedBy(owner), _mediaType(""), _support(SupportType::Unsupported)
28 {
29 }
30 MediaSupportInfo::MediaSupportInfo(shared_ptr<Package> owner, const string& mediaType, bool supported)
31  : OwnedBy(owner),
32  _mediaType(mediaType),
33  _support(supported ? SupportType::IntrinsicSupport : SupportType::Unsupported)
34 {
35 }
36 MediaSupportInfo::MediaSupportInfo(shared_ptr<Package> owner, const string& mediaType, SupportType support)
37  : OwnedBy(owner),
38  _mediaType(mediaType),
39  _support(support)
40 {
41 }
42 MediaSupportInfo::MediaSupportInfo(const MediaSupportInfo& o)
43  : OwnedBy(o),
44  _mediaType(o._mediaType),
45  _support(o._support)
46 {
47 }
48 MediaSupportInfo::MediaSupportInfo(MediaSupportInfo&& o)
49  : OwnedBy(std::move(o)),
50  _mediaType(std::move(o._mediaType)),
51  _support(o._support)
52 {
53  o._support = SupportType::Unsupported;
54 }
55 MediaSupportInfo& MediaSupportInfo::operator=(const MediaSupportInfo &o)
56 {
57  OwnedBy::operator=(o);
58  _mediaType = o._mediaType;
59  _support = o._support;
60  return *this;
61 }
62 MediaSupportInfo& MediaSupportInfo::operator=(MediaSupportInfo &&o)
63 {
64  OwnedBy::operator=(std::move(o));
65  _mediaType = std::move(o._mediaType);
66  _support = o._support;
67  o._support = SupportType::Unsupported;
68  return *this;
69 }
70 bool MediaSupportInfo::HasIntrinsicSupport() const
71 {
72  return _support == SupportType::IntrinsicSupport;
73 }
74 bool MediaSupportInfo::RequiresMediaHandler() const
75 {
76  return _support == SupportType::SupportedWithHandler;
77 }
78 void MediaSupportInfo::SetTypeAndSupport(const string& mediaType, SupportType support)
79 {
80  _mediaType = mediaType;
81  _support = support;
82 }
83 const MediaSupportInfo::ManifestItemList MediaSupportInfo::MatchingManifestItems(shared_ptr<Package> pkg) const
84 {
85  ManifestItemList items;
86  for ( auto pair : pkg->Manifest() )
87  {
88  if ( pair.first == _mediaType )
89  items.push_back(pair.second);
90  }
91  return items;
92 }
